name: Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2
description:
Keep it Going! Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2 is a fully functional game with all the great features of Rock Band.

Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2 is a musical expansion to Rock Band, the smash-hit collaborative, competitive, and single-player music game. Rock Band lets you and your friends form your own band and live out your rock and roll fantasies to music's greatest soundtrack.
